INKCAZELO:

iCandelo Lolawylo Lwezothutho Nemfundo (iTETA ngamafuphi) lasekwa ngenyanga yoKwinda ka-2000 ngokwemigaqo yomthetho iSkills Development Act No 97 ka-1998.

Yasekwa endaweni yeebhodi ezinaltnu zoqeqesho lwamacandelo oshishino ayesakuba ngala, Eleezomoya, Elamanzi, Izikhenkcisi Ezihamba Emigaqweni, Izithuthi Ezithwala Abantu Emigaqweni kwakunye neeBhodi Zoqeqesho zakwaTransnet.

Eli candelo lezothutho ke lijongene namacandelwana asibhozo:


* Eleezomoya
* Ukuthumela phambili Nokucoca
* Ukujongana nemithwalo ebandayo
* Ezasemanzini
* Ezemizila kaloliwe
* Elezithuthi ezithutha ezibandayo emigaqweni
* Amacandelo oshishino athutha uluntu emigaqweni
* Amashishini eetaxi


Imisebenzi yeTETA
iTETA le inoxanduva lokuqulunqa nokuqinisekisa ukusebenza kwesicwangciso sezakhono seli candelo lezothutho. Ikwatsala neentlawulo zezibonelelo ze iqinisekise nomgangatho weentshukumo zoqeqesho kwimfundo nophuhliso lweli candelo.

Ukuze ufumane ezinye iinkcukacha qhagamshelana nala majelo ala macandelwana:
